MarkdownBlockBase.ItemValue: <properties pageTitle="c78c6446-c4c8-4fa5-883c-ec889794196d" description="6954b393-d003-4583-80d9-404808e13c88" services="automation" documentationCenter="" authors="bwren" manager="stevenka" editor="tysonn" /> <tags ms.service="automation" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.workload="infrastructure-services" ms.date="08/18/2015" ms.author="bwren" />

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
$Con = Get-AutomationConnection -Name "TwilioConnection" $NumTo = "14255551212" $NumFrom = "15625551212" $Body = "Text from Azure Automation."
#Send text with connection object. Send-TwilioSMS -Connection $Con -From $NumFrom -To $NumTo -Body $Body
#Send text with connection properties. Send-TwilioSMS -AccountSid $Con.AccountSid -AuthToken $Con.AuthToken $Con -From $NumFrom -To $NumTo -Body $Body
